Class Controller

extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the game's controller.

      • canMove

        public java.lang.Boolean canMove​(java.lang.String lastCell,
                                 java.lang.String currentCell)
        Returns True or False whether the player's movement is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        lastCell - the last cell which player has moved to.
        currentCell - the current cell which player has clicked in.
        Returns:
        True if the player's movement is valid; False if the player's movement is not valid.
        See Also:
        View

      • isGoal

        public java.lang.Boolean isGoal​(java.lang.String lastCellValue)
        Returns True or False whether the player's wins the game.
        Parameters:
        lastCellValue - the value of the last cell which player has moved to.
        Returns:
        True if the player's wins the game by moving to this cell; False if the player's didn't win the game by moving to this cell.
        See Also:
        View
